frontmatter.announcement: Announcing support to migrate old uport identities to new ethereum mainnet identities, see our Release Notes https://developer.uport.me/releases for more details!

node.name: Version 1.1.11
node.description: - Added ability to specify `brandColor` param that can be used by uport mobile app to style requests from your app.  (Note: this feature has not yet been released in the mobile app, will update with the version number when it does)

node.name: Version 1.1.9
node.description: - Minor bug fixes related to Infura URLs

node.name: Version 1.2.1
node.description: - Added support for `rexp` param to specify expiration period for claim signed by verification signature request

node.name: Version 466
node.description:
NEW 
Old uPort Identities will be automatically upgraded to the Ethr-DID specifications
Switcher to allow you use data from both the uportDID and Ethr-DID

To learn more read https://medium.com/uport/goodbye-uport-dids-hello-ethr-dids-ea2e80256f54

node.name: Production Release
node.description:
##### REMOVED
- Accounts screen has been removed
- Rinkeby Faucet has been removed
##### IMPROVED
- Selective Disclosure Request screen has been improved
- Universal links failures have been fixed
##### NEW
- Tap on the account to copy ethereum address
